messages.title: A Firm Pledge on our National Health Service
messages.content: As Conservatives, we understand, both personally and politically, the importance of the National Health Service. ...

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Back Government policies that continue to enhance our nation's economy and so enable us to fund key services
Support effective balanced measures to protect our country and its citizens from the threat of terrorist attack
Give the British people their chance to make the final decision on our nation's continued membership of the EU in a democratic referendum vote

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour have attempted to win in Scotland to the SNP, so it's now impossible for Ed Miliband to become Prime Minister without being propped up by Alex Salmond.

issues.economy: In 2010 we inherited an economy on the brink of bankruptcy. Difficult decisions had to be made...
issues.education: Working to end the post code lottery in secondary school admissions and give schools enough flexibility to expand...
issues.environment: There are pressures for more development and building especially in the suburbs. However green-belt, open spaces and sports grounds must be protected.
issues.governance: Difficult decisions had to be made to turn round this appalling situation.
issues.health: As Conservatives, we understand, both personally and politically, the importance of the National Health Service...

housing.content: Green-belt, open spaces and sports grounds must be protected.

leaflet.personalStatement: I decided to join the Conservative Party and to support Lee because I have no doubt voters need the right person to look after their interest...

politicalExperience.achievements: He has specialized knowledge of complex health issues.

endorsements.endorsement: Former North Ilford Conservatives Chairman and Ilford North Constituency Labour Party Ex-Chair endorses Lee Scott.

images.caption: Presenting Red Rag and Oakfield Petitions to Parliament
